      • fetch

        public void fetch(java.lang.String lastName,
                  java.lang.String firstName,
                  java.lang.String cwid)
        Fetch all the publications for this query "lastname firstInitial[au]" in PubMed and store it on disk.
        Parameters:

        firstInitial - first initial of the author.
        cwid - cwid of the author.
